title: Deadly Kiss
description: Despite being a guy, Eun-Bin has never dated any girl due to his feminine looks. After a chance meeting with upperclassman Yeh-Li who is nick-named “Queen Card” for her beauty, he followed her into a heretical religion…meanwhile in Yeouido, unrealistically beautiful men and women appeared suddenly and started kissing everyone and anyone on the street, turning them into the same unrealistically beautiful men and women. Originally refreshing flower-zombie packed action awaits you!
